definitions.definition: ( India ) A title of respect used before male names, Mr.
examples: The master craftsman received a National Award from the then president of India Shri APJ Abdul Kalam.

definitions.definition: ( India ) An honorific title prefixed to the names of deities, holy persons, holy books or sacred places.

main_definition: ( India ) A title of respect used before male names, Mr.
secondary_definitions: ( India ) An honorific title prefixed to the names of deities, holy persons, holy books or sacred places.

definitions.definition: A unisex given name from Sanskrit .

main_definition: A unisex given name from Sanskrit .
